description:
www.pydata.org

PyData is a gathering of users and developers of data analysis tools
in Python. The goals are to provide Python enthusiasts a place to
share ideas and learn from each other about how best to apply our
language and tools to ever-evolving challenges in the vast realm of
data management, processing, analytics, and visualization.

We aim to be an accessible, community-driven conference, with
tutorials for novices, advanced topical workshops for practitioners,
and opportunities for package developers and users to meet in person.
title: Stemgraphic: A Stem-and-Leaf Plot for the Age of Big Data
